spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout preservation. Room adjacencies and wall alignments are highly accurate. Minor distortion in the entrance/foyer area scaling and door swing visibility.

structural_fidelity.notes: Floating model on neutral background achieved. Roof removed correctly. However, there are illegible hallucinated text artifacts visible in Bed-1 and Toi-1 zones violating strict text constraints.

furniture_mapping.notes: Highly clean block-style furniture placement matching the plan. Scale is consistent across all rooms except for slight compression in the kitchen utility area.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Strong adherence to low-poly, flat-shaded aesthetic. Perfect isometric orthographic camera angle. Lighting is soft and lacks dramatic or unrealistic shadows.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated garbled text labels appear in Bed-1 and bathroom areas.
Minor dimensional scaling distortion in the foyer/entrance wall thickness compared to the 2D plan.
